# Hi, Nice to meet you!

# About me

My name is Shuchen Dong, or you could call me Susie. I obtained a degree in Food and Science Engineering from Northwest A&F University and a degree in General Science from the University of Nebraska-Lincoln during my undergraduate studies. Currently, I am enrolled in a Master of Science program in Biostatistics at Columbia University. You can find my [Resume](resume.html) here.
